collectible.title: Zone-tan's Panties
collectible.text: Don't feel bad about keeping Zone-tan's panties. She'd take yours if she won.

collectible.title: Hentai Key
collectible.subtitle: The key to... what exactly?
collectible.text:
Zone-tan left you this giant peculiar key...
It's almost as big as Zone-tan herself! This key must give access to something very valuable.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Zone-tan plus any three of ZONE's victims: Amalia, Elizabeth, Faye, Go Go, Juri, Kim Possible, Mavis, Panty, Raven, Ryuko, or Starfire.
